review.title: “Great family friendly organisation with forward thinking management team”
review.pros: Pros – Being in the games/entertainment industry!Very flexible with hours when needed9-530 (not expected to put extra hours in)Really nice office environment - fun and relaxed...Great management and lovely people to work withEveryone and anyone can have their opinions heard and the managers are very approachable and down to earth.Share Options available to some
review.cons: Cons – Not really any except you could probably get a bit more cash elsewhere (but would probably have to sacrifice some of the above pros!) and not established a great benefits package yet.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – More of the same! Try to keep the environment if poss as the business grows. Sort out a few benefits like BikeToWork scheme, Gym discounts etc...
